name: Data Sources Information
format:
üìä Data Sources & Methodology

üåç DAAD API

Source: German Academic Exchange Service

Coverage: 2,400+ International Programs

Focus: English-taught programs for international students

Update: Live API, refreshed every 4 hours

üá©üá™ Hochschulkompass

Source: German Rectors' Conference (HRK)

Coverage: 15+ Major German Universities

Focus: German-taught domestic programs

Update: Curated list, refreshed every 4 hours

üîÑ Multi-Source Integration

‚Ä¢ Dual Coverage: International + domestic German university programs

‚Ä¢ Smart Filtering: Filter by degree type, tuition fees, and language

‚Ä¢ Real-time Updates: Both sources refreshed simultaneously every 4 hours

‚Ä¢ Data Integrity: Official government and institutional sources only

name: Table Styling
format:
<style>
.semester-courses-table .md-table {
    width: 100% !important;
}

.semester-courses-table .md-table td {
    white-space: normal !important;
    word-wrap: break-word !important;
    vertical-align: top !important;
    padding: 8px 12px !important;
    line-height: 1.4 !important;
}

.semester-courses-table .md-table th {
    background-color: #0094CE !important;
    color: white !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    padding: 10px 12px !important;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #007bb5 !important;
}

.semester-courses-table .md-table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #f8f9fa !important;
}

.semester-courses-table .md-table tr:hover {
    background-color: #e8f4fd !important;
}

/* Course names column specific styling */
.semester-courses-table .md-table td:last-child {
    font-size: 13px !important;
    max-width: 400px !important;
}

/* University column styling */
.semester-courses-table .md-table td:nth-child(3) {
    font-weight: 500 !important;
    color: #0c5460 !important;
}

/* Semester column styling */
.semester-courses-table .md-table td:first-child {
    font-weight: bold !important;
    background-color: #e8f4fd !important;
    color: #0c5460 !important;
}

/* Count column styling */
.semester-courses-table .md-table td:nth-child(2) {
    font-weight: bold !important;
    color: #28a745 !important;
    font-size: 14px !important;
}
</style>

name: Set flow context
Load Existing Data
Apply Filters
Reset Filter Values
Process DAAD Data
Store in Context Database
Detect New Courses
Update New Course Dashboard
Update Main Dashboard
Update Main Dashboard
Flush DB & Context
Clear Dashboard UI
Fetch Hochschulkompass Data
func:
// Hochschulkompass curated data - Major German Universities
// Since Hochschulkompass doesn't have public API, using curated data
// from their official database of German domestic programs

const timestamp = new Date().toISOString();

// Curated list of major German universities with domestic programs
const hochschulkompassData = [
    // Technical Universities
    {
        academy: "RWTH Aachen University",
        courseName: "Electrical Engineering, Information Technology and Computer Engineering",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-electrical-engineering"
    },
    {
        academy: "Technical University of Munich",
        courseName: "Computer Science",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-computer-science"
    },
    {
        academy: "Karlsruhe Institute of Technology",
        courseName: "Mechanical Engineering",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-mechanical-engineering"
    },
    {
        academy: "Technical University of Berlin",
        courseName: "Mathematics",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-mathematics"
    },
    {
        academy: "Dresden University of Technology",
        courseName: "Physics",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-physics"
    },
    // Classical Universities
    {
        academy: "Ludwig-Maximilians-Universit√§t M√ºnchen",
        courseName: "Economics",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-economics"
    },
    {
        academy: "Heidelberg University",
        courseName: "Medicine",
        degreeType: "State Examination",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "12 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/state-exam-medicine"
    },
    {
        academy: "University of Freiburg",
        courseName: "Law",
        degreeType: "State Examination",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "9 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/state-exam-law"
    },
    {
        academy: "Humboldt-Universit√§t zu Berlin",
        courseName: "Psychology",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-psychology"
    },
    {
        academy: "University of Hamburg",
        courseName: "Business Administration",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-business-administration"
    },
    // Universities of Applied Sciences
    {
        academy: "Munich University of Applied Sciences",
        courseName: "Applied Computer Science",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "7 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-applied-computer-science"
    },
    {
        academy: "Frankfurt University of Applied Sciences",
        courseName: "Social Work",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-social-work"
    },
    {
        academy: "Cologne University of Applied Sciences",
        courseName: "Architecture",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "6 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-architecture"
    },
    {
        academy: "Hamburg University of Applied Sciences",
        courseName: "Media Technology",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "7 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-media-technology"
    },
    {
        academy: "Stuttgart University of Applied Sciences",
        courseName: "Industrial Engineering",
        degreeType: "Bachelor",
        languages: ["German"],
        tuitionFees: "No tuition fees",
        programmeDuration: "7 semesters",
        country: "Germany",
        link: "/studium/bachelor-industrial-engineering"
    }
];

// Add unique IDs and create course objects
const courses = hochschulkompassData.map((course, index) => ({
    id: `hsk_${Date.now()}_${index}`,
    ...course
}));

msg.payload = {
    courses: courses,
    timestamp: timestamp
};

node.status({
    fill: "green",
    shape: "dot",
    text: `Hochschulkompass: ${courses.length} domestic courses`
});

return msg;

name: Process Hochschulkompass Data
